long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spark meaningful conversations effortlessly with the Icebreaker Questions extension! This user-friendly plugin offers a curated collection of fun and engaging questions to make social interactions enjoyable and memorable. Perfect for gatherings, team meetings, or casual chats, this tool helps you connect with others in an authentic and relaxed way.

Key Features:
Curated Question Library:
Access a wide range of icebreaker questions designed to suit various occasions, including parties, work meetings, or casual hangouts.

Random Question Generator:
Generate a random question with a single click, ensuring fresh and engaging prompts every time.

Category Selection:
Choose questions from categories like humor, relationships, or professional topics to match the mood and setting.

Save Your Favorites:
Easily bookmark your favorite questions for quick access during future interactions.

Customizable Preferences:
Personalize your experience by tailoring the type and style of questions to your specific needs.

Transform every social interaction into a memorable moment with the Icebreaker Questions extensionâ€”your perfect tool for building connections!
